Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

Red Onion and wash
3 Scallions and wash
2 Garlic Cloves
Bell Pepper and wash
2 Zuchinnis and wash
5 Crimini Mushrooms and wash
Soy Sauce
2 Pad Thai Sauces
Spirilizer
Vegetable Oil

Recipe

Put 3 seconds of Vegetable Oil in pantelligent on 4
Cut Red Onion
Cut 3 Scallions
Cut Bell Pepper
Cut 2 Garlic Cloves
Cut 5 Crimini Mushrooms
Wait 7 minutes put vegetables in pan
Spirilizer 2 Zuchinnis
Wait 7 minutes
Put sprilized zuchinni in the pan
Wait 2 minutes
Put in Measuring tsp Soy Sauce
Put in 2 Measuring tbsp Pad Thai Sauces
